parse.title: Tales and Songs of Bimble Bay

links.*: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
'''Tales and Songs of Bimble Bay''' are a series of poems written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. Although [[Humphrey Carpenter]] wrote that they were written in [[1922]],<ref>{{HM|Bio}}, p. 106</ref> [[Christina Scull]] and [[Wayne G. Hammond]] place the time of composition as c. [[1928]].<ref>{{CG|II}}, p. 997</ref> The poems tell stories about an imaginary English coastal town and harbour, Bimble Bay.

==List of poems==
*"[[The Bumpus]]" (revised as "[[Perry-the-Winkle]]")
*"[[The Dragon's Visit]]"
*"[[Glip]]"
*"[[Old Grabbler]]"
*"[[Progress in Bimble Town]]"
*"[[A Song of Bimble Bay]]"
